sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input v-if="email === email" class="my__input" :type="email" :vlaue="modelValue" :placeholder="placeholder" @input="updateInput" required/>
    <input v-else-if="tel === true" v-maska="'+#(###)###-##-##'" class="my__input" type="text" :vlaue="modelValue" :placeholder="placeholder" @input="updateInput" required/>
    <input v-else class="my__input" type="text" :vlaue="modelValue" :placeholder="placeholder" @input="updateInput" required/>
</template>
<script>
import { maska } from 'maska'
    export default {
        name: 'my-input',
        directives: { maska },
        props:{
            modelValue: [String,Number],
            placeholder: String,
            tel: Boolean,
            email: String
        },
        methods: {
            updateInput (event) {
                this.$emit('update:modelValue',event.target.value)
            }
        }
    }
</script>
<style lang="sass" scoped>
    .my__input
        -webkit-appearance: none
        border: 1px solid transparent
        padding: 10px 16px 10px 16px
        border-radius: 10px
        box-sizing: border-box
        display: flex
        width: 100%
    .my__input::placeholder
        color: #B4B4B4
    .my__input:active, :hover, :focus
        outline: 0
        outline-offset: 0
</style>
